title: ARC83-lite
description:
I just wanted to upload this since it is so damn hard to find.

Screen Shot: http://www.scannermaster.com/v/vspfiles/photos/01-520976-2.gif


* ARC83 includes THE most versatile memory editor available on the market.
* Paste Frequencies DIRECTLY from any website using WebCatcher or 'Paste Special' (V1.02 and up)
* Setup channels in an easy, spreadsheet type interface.
* Setup the 10 custom search ranges
* ARC83 comes with popular search ranges pre-programmed.
* User Manual (30 pages, PDF file)
* Store Unlimited number of configurations on your harddisk.
* Program memory channel tags, bank tags, delay / Lockout (tags for file only)
* Copy/Move/Swap memory banks / memory channels
* Easy and FREE FCC Frequency Database access (ARC83 webcatcher imports frequencies from icom pcr100/1000 format files)
* Compatible with Windows 98 / ME / Win2000 / XP.

* Easy user interface
* All updates are free for registered users (Scancat lite updates are NOT free, for every new version you pay!)
* All tags can be centered
* With ARC83 you can easily IMPORT frequencies from ANY website into your PRO-83. For detailed step by step instructions click here. or read user the manual 'paste special' option.
* Create FREE custom files for your local area online.
* Setup your PRO83 in an easy spreadsheet type interface.
* Setup your own memory bank 'tags'.

* Table tags are saved in memory files
* Easy cut/copy/paste data between channels and banks.
* Extra cut/copy/paste buttons that selects entire channel data
* Move channels up and down with quick move buttons
* Import CSV data
* Export CSV data
* Fill down option
* Fill series option
* Software shows you which banks are empty
* Full clipboard support for import/export data to/from other applications
* Insert/remove/delete/swap/sort channels with a few mouse clicks
* Move/Copy/Swap entire memory banks or memory channels in seconds
* Easy data toggle with mouse double click or space bar or keyboard shortcuts
* Sort frequencies per bank
* Sort a range of channels
* Remove duplicate frequencies
* Easy Fill for setting up new banks in a few seconds (enter a start frequency and a step, and easyfill will calculate and fill the selected bank)
* With EasyFill you can use memory banks as search banks

* Import frequencies directly from any website with the famous Webcatcher (integrated in ARC83-lite!).

* Import frequencies from any wordprocessor / database / spreadsheet.
* Extra Dummy bank for storing temporary data while you are re-organising your scanner channels.
* Print option
* And many more options.
* Please compare our software with the 'other' package that costs over $34.00 (and they charge for every update!), ARC83 updates are free!

System Requirements:
* Windows 98/xp/2000/me/Vista
* PC interface for connecting PRO83 / PRO-83 to PC (IF2B or RadioShack 20-289)
* Free serial port (use USB converters at your own risk!) 

Please seed and comment!
